1.content:
It was another boring day in my little home in this city. Sure the city is busy but now it summer vacation and there nothing to do. Then I heard a doorbell ring. I walk towards it and saw a mail woman and she have a package for me.


After a few minutes telling me what going on with this weird delivery. I have to accept that after being check with the x-ray, drug dogs, and bomb checking devices that it was safe for me to have it. How much will this cost me? I thought in my head. It turn out that the post office was backup doing their random testing of suspect package and mine was pick. So I didn't have to pay for it. So I tips the mail woman and walk away from the door and closed it. I open the package and it was a TV remote. By the look of it, it was very common remote. It didn't have instructions for it and I huh out loud. I walk towards the couch and turn on the Tv with the new remote.. It started out as normal but then a menu pop out saying...


Thank you for paying & using the Alteration Remote Device. A.R.D for short. Are you tired of reruns of old shows that boring. Now with this new remote you can watch Tv show and movies that have either the main character or characters being altered. Watching I Love Lucy where Lucy looking dull. A clip of I Love Lucy came up showing Lucille Ball walking and she stop. The TV asking me what alteration could she have. I joke having huge breast the size of Yoga balls. Then Lucille Ball chest inflating to the size of Yoga balls and she joking that she shouldn't drink that punch causing her chest to swell. Then she walk backwards and she went the same spot she was again, only to return to normal. Then the TV asking me again what alterations. If this was a cartoon my jaw would have hit the floor. Then I tried everything within reason, from muscle expansion to massive pregnancy. It work. So after telling me this have a help menu if I get into trouble. Th Tv went back to normal and flipping a few channels I've found...
1.title: The Day of the remote came in by mail.

135311131.content:
Without a moment's hesitation I changed the channel as I was in a different cartoon show in this case Littlest Pet Shop A World Of Our Own, as I was now in a place known as Pawtucket.

At that moment I overheard a friendly discussion about whether boys or girls have the best singing voices, as Roxy and her friends saw yours truly who was standing in an area that was right from where they were at.

"He must be new to Pawtucket and he looks like he's lost ergo we'll go over there introduce ourselves and help him out." Roxie a Boston terrier proudly said.

"Oh great ergo you guys go introduce yourselves while I stay here and watch everything unfold." Jade a Bombay cat sarcastically said.

"Oh boy here we go I'd say this guy's shy or something." Trip a rapper hamster said upon seeing me.

"He looks friendly albeit shy and whatnot." Quincy a fainting goat said as he looked in my direction.

"Perfect I now have an audience member to entertain." Edie a fancy dramatic parakeet said as she's quite an entertainer.

"After all we don't want this guy to get lost or anything ergo we'll do what we can to help." Bev an energetic box turtle said.

Roxie and the others sans Jade came up to me everything.

"You're new here right? Allow me to introduce myself my name's Roxie and that sarcastic Bombay cat over there is Jade as these guys are Trip Quincy Edie and Bev.

"Hello there everyone, anyway I couldn't help but overhear your conversation about whether boys or girls have the best singing voices." I said as I greeted everyone.

"Uh I didn't get your name and have you by any chance heard of someone who can make your wishes come true?" Roxie asked.

"My name's Ace Dalmatian and no I haven't heard of someone who can make your wishes come true." I said as I revealed my name and species.

"Well Ace we're heading over to where this person who can make your wishes come true is in town ergo why don't you come along with us?" Roxie asked me.

"All right I'll come along with you guys." I said as I agreed to go with Roxie and her friends as we walked over to where this person was at.

"What is your wish that you want to come true?" The mysterious person asked us.

"Well you see we wondering if either boys or girls have the best singing voices and we all wish that we can have the best singing voices in all of Pawtucket." I said as our wish was granted.

"Your wish has been granted ergo all you have to do is say to each of yourselves I have the best singing voice in all of Pawtucket but beware for there happens to be a price for having your wish come true." The mysterious person said as she warned us about a price for having a wish come true.

"What kind of price is it?" Roxie asked the mysterious person.

"Let's just say it'll be a gigantic fat surprise and don't worry if you're still gigantic and fat after you're done singing it's perfectly normal." The mysterious person said.

After that we walked outside as one of us at a time said to ourselves I have the best singing voice in all of Pawtucket as all of us transformed into giant fat singing animals.

I along with Quincy performed a duet of Garth Brook's unanswered prayers while Jade sang an R&B tune as Roxie Edie and Bev sang all I ask of you from Phantom of the opera.
